title: Prom Pissawat
overview: This story is about how two completely different people met at the behest of fate. Prapon, half-Korean, half-Thai, has lived in Korea all his life. Considering his new stepmother to be another fortune hunter for his father, Prapon escapes to Thailand. He firmly believes that all women in the world are the same as his stepmother, who caused the divorce of his father from his own mother. Hating his stepmother with all his being, Prapon breaks off business relations with his father and opens his own record company. While already in Thailand, Prapon visits a bar where he meets a young girl named Pantawan. She is a talented and attractive singer, popular among men. The main character believes that she is the same as all other women. But Pantawan another and does not tolerate insults from anyone, especially from such a misogynist as Prapon. Endless quarrels lead young people to light feelings. But the happiness is short, as it reveals another truth: the mother of Pantawan - new stepmother of Prepona.
